original_title: Vieques en el espejo de Panamá
overview: Through the use of historical film, images, and interviews with government officials, environmentalists, and residents, this documentary details the Panama and Vieques nexus relevant to abuses by U.S. military forces in usurping lands for military purposes. It attempts to present the current and possible future situation of Vieques through the experiences of Panama.
title: Vieques en el espejo de Panamá
